title: Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in red color pencil and graphite
markings: Small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P/7129 [in graphite]
description: Plan and elevation drawings for end table. Small, rectangular table top of bakelite or lacquered surface, with light wooden drawer below with rectangular drawer pull. Drawer supported by two sets of metal strap legs that form horizontal rectangle. Metal strap legs supported by two squat rectangular feet of a dark wood. Table top opens from middle of top to reveal space within.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in red color pencil and graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1265.
